desc: At Hometown Fitted, we're all about being proud of where you're from because there's no place like home. Our West Valley City, Utah apparel is exclusive and you won't find it anywhere else. We support those making WVC a better place and do our part in making the community a safer and better place.

layout.text: Be Proud of Where You're From
Letting others know that West Valley City is #MoreThanTheGhetto. We help you have pride in your hometown. No hate, no violence, just respect & positivity.
